sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Tricks">a8c6c0be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbef</category> <github_id>81</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/81</github_url> <message>Pass the seconds and query as required similar to defining the entry in sys_auto_flush table  ```javascript var tc = new GlideTableCleaner(table, seconds, 'sys_created_on'); if (query) tc.setConditions(query); tc.clean(); ```</message> <number>TIL0001082</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-03-31 13:45:48</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b6b96dec2f13601051dad5f62799b61d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-06-14 12:03:44</sys_updated_on> <title>Table Cleaner Via Script</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
